postFeatureReview.summary: Cleaned up all 8 guide articles across GB and IE regions to comply with the new GuideArticle schema. Removed all badge fields (integrated context into titles), converted markdown tables to prose bullet lists, and removed emojis from titles.
postFeatureReview.impact: All guide articles in src/data/regions/*/en/articles/guides/ now follow consistent patterns: no badge fields, no markdown tables in content, no emojis. The comparisonTables field remains available for structured data that needs tabular rendering.
postFeatureReview.issues: None. All changes maintain content integrity while improving schema compliance.
postFeatureReview.recommendations: Consider consolidating some groups in uk-betting-industry-report.ts and ie-betting-industry-report.ts which have 6-7 groups. Future guides should aim for 3-5 groups maximum.
